entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
